<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Defy Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=2416) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 50 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Orc Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=83)

</column>

---

You're exceptionally difficult to kill. The DC of your recovery checks is equal to 9 + your dying value, or 8 + your dying value if you have the [Toughness](/Feats.aspx?ID=855) general feat. In addition, whenever someone returns you to life using magic that would normally leave you debilitated for a week (such as [_raise dead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=243) or the [resurrect](/Rituals.aspx?ID=20) ritual), you don't suffer that condition.
name: Defy Death
